verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G565><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> which is the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias. <S%G5085><s%>

And a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> they saw <S%G3708><s%> his miracles <S%G4592><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he did <S%G4160><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them that were diseased. <S%G770><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G424><s%> up into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain, <S%G3735><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> he sat <S%G2521><s%> with his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>
And the passover, <S%G3957><s%> a feast <S%G1859><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> was near. <S%G1451><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> lifted <S%G1869><s%> up his eyes, <S%G3788><s%> and saw <S%G2300><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> company <S%G3793><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to him, he said <S%G3004><s%> to Philip, <S%G5376><s%> From where <S%G4159><s%> shall we buy <S%G59><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> may eat? <S%G5315><s%>
And this <S%G5124><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to prove <S%G3985><s%> him: for he himself <S%G846><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> he would <S%G3195><s%> do. <S%G4160><s%>

Philip <S%G5376><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, Two <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> pennyworth <S%G1220><s%> of bread <S%G740><s%> is not sufficient <S%G714><s%> for them, that every <S%G1538><s%> one of them may take <S%G2983><s%> a little. <S%G1024><s%>
One <S%G1520><s%> of his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Andrew, <S%G406><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter's <S%G4074><s%> brother, <S%G80><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him,

There is a lad <S%G3808><s%> here, <S%G5602><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> small <S%G3795><s%> fishes: <S%G3795><s%> but what <S%G5101><s%> are they among <S%G1519><s%> so <S%G5118><s%> many? <S%G5118><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> the men <S%G444><s%> sit <S%G377><s%> down. <S%G377><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> there was much <S%G4183><s%> grass <S%G5528><s%> in the place. <S%G5117><s%> So <S%G3767><s%> the men <S%G435><s%> sat <S%G377><s%> down, <S%G377><s%> in number <S%G706><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> five <S%G4000><s%> thousand. <S%G4000><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> the loaves; <S%G740><s%> and when he had given thanks, <S%G2168><s%> he distributed <S%G1239><s%> to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> to them that were set <S%G345><s%> down; <S%G345><s%> and likewise <S%G3668><s%> of the fishes <S%G3795><s%> as much <S%G3745><s%> as they would. <S%G2309><s%>

When <S%G5613><s%> they were filled, <S%G1705><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> Gather <S%G4863><s%> up the fragments <S%G2801><s%> that remain, <S%G4052><s%> that nothing <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5100><s%> be lost. <S%G622><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they gathered <S%G4863><s%> them together, <S%G4863><s%> and filled <S%G1072><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> baskets <S%G2894><s%> with the fragments <S%G2801><s%> of the five <S%G4002><s%> barley <S%G2916><s%> loaves, <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> remained <S%G4052><s%> over <S%G4052><s%> and above to them that had eaten. <S%G977><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> when they had seen <S%G1492><s%> the miracle <S%G4592><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is of a truth <S%G230><s%> that prophet <S%G4396><s%> that should come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world. <S%G2889><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> perceived <S%G1097><s%> that they would <S%G3195><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and take <S%G726><s%> him by force, <S%G726><s%> to make <S%G4160><s%> him a king, <S%G935><s%> he departed <S%G402><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a mountain <S%G3735><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>
And when <S%G5613><s%> even <S%G3798><s%> was now come, <S%G1096><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

And entered <S%G1684><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship, <S%G4143><s%> and went <S%G2064><s%> over <S%G4008><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum. <S%G2584><s%> And it was now <S%G2235><s%> dark, <S%G4653><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not come <S%G2064><s%> to them.
And the sea <S%G2281><s%> arose <S%G1326><s%> by reason of a great <S%G3173><s%> wind <S%G417><s%> that blew. <S%G4154><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> when they had rowed <S%G1643><s%> about <S%G5613><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> furlongs, <S%G4712><s%> they see <S%G2334><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and drawing <S%G1096><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the ship: <S%G4143><s%> and they were afraid. <S%G5399><s%>
But he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, It is I; be not afraid. <S%G5399><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> they willingly <S%G2309><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the ship: <S%G4143><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> the ship <S%G4143><s%> was at <S%G1909><s%> the land <S%G1093><s%> where <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> they went. <S%G5217><s%>

The day <S%G1887><s%> following, <S%G1887><s%> when the people <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea <S%G2281><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that there was none <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> boat <S%G4142><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> into where <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739><s%> his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were entered, <S%G1684><s%> and that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G4897><s%> not with his disciples <S%G3101><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the boat, <S%G4142><s%> but that his disciples <S%G3101><s%> were gone <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> alone; <S%G3441><s%>

(However, <S%G1161><s%> there came <S%G2064><s%> other <S%G243><s%> boats <S%G4142><s%> from Tiberias <S%G5085><s%> near <S%G1451><s%> to the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> they did eat <S%G5315><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> after that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had given thanks: <S%G2168><s%>)

When <S%G3753><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was not there, <S%G1563><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> they also <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G1684><s%> <S%G1519><s%> shipping, <S%G4143><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> for Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And when <S%G4218><s%> they had found <S%G2147><s%> him on the other <S%G4008><s%> side <S%G4008><s%> of the sea, <S%G2281><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> when came <S%G1096><s%> you here? <S%G5602><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them and said, <S%G2036><s%> Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, You seek <S%G2212><s%> me, not because <S%G3754><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> the miracles, <S%G4592><s%> but because <S%G3754><s%> you did eat <S%G5315><s%> of the loaves, <S%G740><s%> and were filled. <S%G5526><s%>

Labor <S%G2038><s%> not for the meat <S%G1035><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> perishes, <S%G622><s%> but for that meat <S%G1035><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> endures <S%G3306><s%> to everlasting <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall give <S%G1325><s%> to you: for him has God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> sealed. <S%G4972><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, What <S%G5101><s%> shall we do, <S%G4160><s%> that we might work <S%G2038><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, This <S%G5124><s%> is the work <S%G2041><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> that you believe <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> he has sent. <S%G649><s%>

They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to him, What <S%G5101><s%> sign <S%G4592><s%> show <S%G4160><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> that we may see, <S%G1492><s%> and believe <S%G4100><s%> you? what <S%G5101><s%> do you work? <S%G2038><s%>

Our fathers <S%G3962><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> manna <S%G3131><s%> in the desert; <S%G2048><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> He gave <S%G1325><s%> them bread <S%G740><s%> from heaven <S%G3772><s%> to eat. <S%G5315><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Moses <S%G3475><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> you not that bread <S%G740><s%> from heaven; <S%G3772><s%> but my Father <S%G3962><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> you the true <S%G228><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

For the bread <S%G740><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is he which <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and gives <S%G1325><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> to the world. <S%G2889><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> they to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> ever more <S%G3842><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> us this <S%G5126><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> of life: <S%G2222><s%> he that comes <S%G2064><s%> to me shall never <S%G165><s%> hunger; <S%G3983><s%> and he that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G4455><s%> thirst. <S%G1372><s%>
But I said <S%G2036><s%> to you, That you also <S%G2532><s%> have seen <S%G3708><s%> me, and believe <S%G4100><s%> not.
All <S%G3956><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> gives <S%G1325><s%> me shall come <S%G2240><s%> to me; and him that comes <S%G2064><s%> to me I will in no <S%G3364><s%> wise cast <S%G1544><s%> out.
For I came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> not to do <S%G4160><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> own will, <S%G2307><s%> but the will <S%G2307><s%> of him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me.

And this <S%G5124><s%> is the Father's <S%G3962><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has sent <S%G3992><s%> me, that of all <S%G3956><s%> which he has given <S%G1325><s%> me I should lose <S%G622><s%> nothing, <S%G3361><s%> <S%G848><s%> but should raise <S%G450><s%> it up again <S%G450><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> is the will <S%G2307><s%> of him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me, that every <S%G3956><s%> one which <S%G3588><s%> sees <S%G2334><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him, may have <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> and I will raise <S%G450><s%> him up at the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> murmured <S%G1111><s%> at <S%G4012><s%> him, because <S%G3754><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> the bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

And they said, <S%G3004><s%> Is not this <S%G3778><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and mother <S%G3384><s%> we know? <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> is it then <S%G3767><s%> that he said, <S%G3004><s%> I came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven? <S%G3772><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Murmur <S%G1111><s%> not among <S%G3326><s%> yourselves. <S%G240><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to me, except <S%G3362><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> has sent <S%G3992><s%> me draw <S%G1670><s%> him: and I will raise <S%G450><s%> him up at the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>

It is written <S%G1125><s%> in the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> And they shall be all <S%G3956><s%> taught <S%G1318><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> man therefore <S%G3767><s%> that has heard, <S%G191><s%> and has learned <S%G3129><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to me.
Not that any <S%G5100><s%> man has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> save <S%G1508><s%> he which <S%G3588><s%> is of God, <S%G2316><s%> he has seen <S%G3708><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, He that believes <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> me has <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
I am <S%G1510><s%> that bread <S%G740><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
Your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> manna <S%G3131><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and are dead. <S%G599><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> is the bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> comes <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> that a man <S%G5100><s%> may eat <S%G5315><s%> thereof, <S%G1538><s%> <S%G846><s%> and not die. <S%G599><s%>

I am <S%G1510><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven: <S%G3772><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man eat <S%G5315><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> he shall live <S%G2198><s%> for ever: <S%G165><s%> and the bread <S%G740><s%> that I will give <S%G1325><s%> is my flesh, <S%G4561><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> for the life <S%G2222><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> strove <S%G3164><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> man give <S%G1325><s%> us his flesh <S%G4561><s%> to eat? <S%G5315><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Except <S%G3362><s%> you eat <S%G5315><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> his blood, <S%G129><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in you.

Whoever <S%G3588><s%> eats <S%G5176><s%> my flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> my blood, <S%G129><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and I will raise <S%G450><s%> him up at the last <S%G2078><s%> day. <S%G2250><s%>
For my flesh <S%G4561><s%> is meat <S%G1035><s%> indeed, <S%G230><s%> and my blood <S%G129><s%> is drink <S%G4215><s%> indeed. <S%G230><s%>
He that eats <S%G5176><s%> my flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and drinks <S%G4095><s%> my blood, <S%G129><s%> dwells <S%G3306><s%> in me, and I in him.

As the living <S%G2198><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> has sent <S%G649><s%> me, and I live <S%G2198><s%> by the Father: <S%G3962><s%> so <S%G2532><s%> he that eats <S%G5176><s%> me, even <S%G2548><s%> he shall live <S%G2198><s%> by me.

This <S%G3778><s%> is that bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> came <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from heaven: <S%G3772><s%> not as your <S%G5216><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> did eat <S%G5315><s%> manna, <S%G3131><s%> and are dead: <S%G599><s%> he that eats <S%G5176><s%> of this <S%G5126><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> shall live <S%G2198><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%>
